availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married Hannah Markland. Father of Mary C. Markland, Elizabeth Markland, Charles Markland, Sarah Markland, Nathaniel Markland, Fielder Markland, and Nathan Markland. Farmer in Bath County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, p. 58B
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, p. 53
Find A Grave, "Nathaniel Markland (1819-1877)," Memorial #94283037, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/94283037 (accessed October 21, 2019).
